Future-Ready Consulting Roles

While our roles remain recognisable to clients and internal teams, their focus, tools, and value creation are shifting dramatically. This enables faster, higher-quality outcomes without dismantling the familiar consulting grade structure.

Evolving Focus by Grade

Partner

Focus: Market/Client Orchestration. AI-Enabled Capabilities: AI-assisted market scanning, opportunity qualification, and client relationship management dashboards.

Principal

Focus: Complex Engagement Design & Governance. AI-Enabled Capabilities: AI-supported programme modelling, risk prediction, and governance automation.

Senior Consultant

Focus: Solution & Delivery Curation. AI-Enabled Capabilities: AI-accelerated solution design and delivery tracking with predictive alerts.

Consultant

Focus: Execution & Value Realisation. AI-Enabled Capabilities: AI-driven workflow orchestration, knowledge synthesis, and real-time client reporting.

Analyst
